name: Age of Conan: Unchained - Ultimate Level 80 Bundle
detailed_description:
The Ultimate Level 80 Bundle allows you to boost a single new character straight to Level 80. After completing character creation, you will be given the option to set your newly created character to Level 80.

Your boosted character will also receive the following:

  • Max Rank Combos and Spells
  • Full Set of Raid Gear (Tier 3)
  • Max Inventory Bag (216 slots)
  • Max Resource Bag (102 slots)
  • Complete Mount Training
  • Purebred Tarpani Stallion
  • 4 Royal Treasure Chests
  • Additional Specialization
  • 100 Expertise Points
  • 20 Teleport Coins

Note: All items are spawned on your newly created Level 80 character.

*Membership offers and loyalty rewards cannot be claimed on Saga Servers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP / Vista / 7 or later
  • Processor:3Ghz Pentium IV or later
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Shader model 2.0 and 128 MB RAM: NVIDIA GeForce 5800 or ATI 9800 or better
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:30 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
